title: Land for Sale in Nugegoda
details:
Suitable for a Commercial Purpose ,

With a road access of 20 feet and being able to manour any type of vehcile this will be ideal for a ware house or even for a large store

Or even for an aprtment project

Located along old kasbawa road bewteen kattiya junction and delkande junction

Perch 115
Per Parch Rs. 17 Lakhs (negotiable)

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
